Articles.Content:
Hey guys. 

I'm not new to the game, but I am new to the forums, and I am hoping to be coming her more often. I am not the best at the game but I am always looking for new ways not to smack my kerbals into the sweet embrace of the cold ground. I try to stream ksp on monday nights to show off how much I suck at keeping kerbals alive, so far I'm down two kerbals and have had to rescue 3 of them from dead orbits that were meant for the mun.

Anyways, are there any official dicord groups or chat areas for people that play this game where I can go to bum tips off people?

Look forward to hanging with you all

Soljak

Hello Soljak Kerman and welcome to the KSP Forums!

If you look near the top of the forum page, you should see a link labelled (somewhat redundantly) 'IRC Chat'.  This will take you to the official chat area for the game.  Also, please be aware of the Gameplay Questions and Tutorials section of the forum here.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Hello @Soljak Kerman, and welcome to the forum!

I don't think there are official discord groups, but if you check on The Lounge forums there are a couple unofficial ones. And, on the top of the screen, there's a link to the official KSP IRC channel.
